area_comments: As per the Sale Deed and plan, total built-up area is 2,100 Sq. Ft. consisting of Ground Floor 1,050 Sq. Ft. and First Floor 1,050 Sq. Ft.
amenities: Compound Wall; Municipal Water; Electricity Connection; Covered Car Park
occupancy_comments: Based on the Sale Deed and municipal tax receipt, the property is self-occupied by the owner.
construction_comments: Fully completed residential house as per Sale Deed and physical verification.
address_2_comparable_1: Green Villas Road No. 5 (As per site)
address_2_comparable_2: Green Villas Road No. 5 (As per site)
market_value_information_source: Registered sale deed dated 03-Feb-2020, Registered sale deed dated 05-Feb-2020
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Sale deed, plan permission, municipal tax receipt, electricity bill, valuation initiation form
valuer_comments:
- The subject property is a residential independent house located at Plot No. 177, Survey No. 277, Green Villas, Ameenpur Village, Sangareddy District.
- As per the Sale Deed, the land area is 134 Sq. Yards (1,206 Sq. Ft.) and total built up area is 2,100 Sq. Ft. (Ground Floor: 1,050 Sq. Ft. + First Floor: 1,050 Sq. Ft.).
- The area adopted for valuation is as per sale deed and plan.
- The property is fully constructed and self-occupied by the owner.
- The property is located within a well-developed residential colony with good infrastructure and no negative area observed.
- No deviation in area or setbacks was noted based on available documents.
- The valuation is based on comparable market sales of similar properties in the Green Villas area.
- Expected future physical life is considered as 55 years based on age and good condition of the property.
- Assumption is made regarding clear title and proper approvals based on documents provided.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 22-Jul-2025 is INR 7,875,000/- [Seven Million Eight Hundred Seventy Five Thousand Rupees] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
